concept.title: 232.705-70 Clause for limitation of Government’s obligation.

conbody.p: Use the clause at 252.232-7007 , Limitation of Government's Obligation, in solicitations and resultant incrementally funded fixed-price contracts. The contracting officer may revise the contractor’s notification period, in paragraph (c) of the clause, from “ninety” to “thirty” or “sixty” days, as appropriate.
